Description: Verify user can login with valid username and password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click login button
Expected Result: User should be logged in successfully and redirected to dashboard

Description: Verify error handling for invalid login attempts
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed and user remains on login page

Description: Verify user can reset password via email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to password reset page
2. Enter registered email address
3. Click reset password button
4. Check email for reset link
Expected Result: Password reset email should be sent with secure link
QA Notes: Verify email delivery in different email clients
